Vela Panel Update

In House Design

The Vela Panel allows Care Managers to access their caseload at scale from a prioritized list according to their personal preference or program objectives.

The project's goal was to create a Panel for the Pro that matches their mental model to our conceptual model allowing for effective caseload management.

View Case Study

Thank you Joshua,



Thank you for the guidance, freedom and the opportunity to do everything I did so far to increase design awareness in the organization here. The India team has a major shift in including design into conversation after a lot of evaluation and I'm glad you let me lead this by consistent discovery, bringing perspectives and identify user, business and product goals in every single product line I am a part of.

Thank you for the guidance and most importantly trusting me to make progress with the team here. The transparency in the design team in the last few quarters was phenomenal and encouraged each of one us to truly understand the product and question things, gently. And I'm glad we could all do that often. I hope we can continue to bring that to our team and take charge where necessary and halt and guide when needed, which under your leadership was truly a great success
Snigdha Nanduri, Product Designer, Integrate

Quizzly

In House Design

Quizzly is a market research platform for the medical community. Quizzly needed an administrator portal to collect profiling data. The tool also allows admins to create group/attribute pairs and questions targeted to specific specialties and countries. In addition, the portal has reporting to show fill rates per question.

View Case Study

Twine Health Site Redesign

In House Design

Background & Objective

The overarching goal was to make the site more consumer friendly. I designed 6 layouts, totaling 8 pages. The kicker is I had to do all this in one week.

View Project

Joshua Litchfield

Principal Product Designer

I strive to work in environments that focus on inclusivity, integrity, continuous learning and improvement where outcomes, not features, are the focus.

Want to get to know me better? Check out my about page to learn to view a user guide to me, see what I'm reading, and check out some of my personality traits.
